document_data.name: Flamebeard's Firebrandy
document_data.mainbody: '''Flamebeard's Firebrandy''' was a fiery liquor and the signature drink from [[Kelvin's Comfort]] in [[Bryn Shander]].
document_data.Description:
A few warm shots of Firebeard's Firebrandy were advertised by [[Augrek Brighthelm]] to help in keeping the cold at bay.

The liquor was in fact a cheap rotgut from [[Mirabar]] that [[Ogden Flamebeard]], proprietor of the tavern, purchased in bulk and then relabeled and resold at a considerably higher price.
document_data.History: Sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]], the [[dwarven]] criminal [[Worvil Forkbeard]] was known to be addicted to Flamebeard's Firebrandy. Sir [[Baric Nylef]] hoped to use Worvil's cravings for it as an opportunity to catch him.
